name: Clev's Space Operation
description:
You are CLEV (Our only modeller lol)! Get to the moon with your rocket.

More info and Credits will be in the game!

Controls:

- Steering: A and D

- Launch: Spacebar

Mission:

Get to the moon! You will need to upgrade your rocket to get there.
